The following is a Click to Reveal (CTR) component. The CTR boxes can contain any HTML a developer wants, which includes images and normal text. Using the Bootstrap Grid classes in the element, the CTR component can be placed anywhere. The placement of the reveal-section, can also be modified to be: Right, Left, T

The CTR component on the right of this text is the same demensions as the component above, however, it has one clickable box. To achieve the same demensions, the Bootstrap Grid classes must be applied properly. This row of content is divided up into this text and the CTR, since they have 'col-md-6'. Each box within the CTR takes up half of the container. If the CTR on the right was put into a container with a class of 'col-md-12' it would look like the one below...
